test-case.name: K-NumericMultiply-1
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `xs:double(6) * xs:double(2) eq 12`.

test-case.name: K-NumericMultiply-2
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `xs:decimal(6) * xs:decimal(2) eq 12`.

test-case.name: K-NumericMultiply-3
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `xs:integer(6) * xs:integer(2) eq 12`.

test-case.name: K-NumericMultiply-4
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `xs:float(6) * xs:float(2) eq 12`.

test-case.name: K-NumericMultiply-5
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `(xs:decimal(6) * xs:integer(2)) instance of xs:decimal`.

test-case.name: K-NumericMultiply-6
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `(xs:integer(6) * xs:decimal(2)) instance of xs:decimal`.

test-case.name: K-NumericMultiply-7
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `(xs:integer(6) * xs:integer(2)) instance of xs:integer`.

test-case.name: K-NumericMultiply-8
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `(xs:decimal(6) * xs:decimal(2)) instance of xs:decimal`.

test-case.name: K-NumericMultiply-9
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `(xs:decimal(6) * xs:float(2)) instance of xs:float`.

test-case.name: K-NumericMultiply-10
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `(xs:float(6) * xs:decimal(2)) instance of xs:float`.

test-case.name: K-NumericMultiply-11
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `(xs:float(6) * xs:integer(2)) instance of xs:float`.

test-case.name: K-NumericMultiply-12
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `(xs:integer(6) * xs:float(2)) instance of xs:float`.

test-case.name: K-NumericMultiply-13
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `(xs:float(6) * xs:float(2)) instance of xs:float`.

test-case.name: K-NumericMultiply-14
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `(xs:decimal(6) * xs:double(2)) instance of xs:double`.

test-case.name: K-NumericMultiply-15
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `(xs:double(6) * xs:decimal(2)) instance of xs:double`.

test-case.name: K-NumericMultiply-16
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `(xs:double(6) * xs:float(2)) instance of xs:double`.

test-case.name: K-NumericMultiply-17
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `(xs:float(6) * xs:double(2)) instance of xs:double`.

test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `(xs:double(6) * xs:integer(2)) instance of xs:double`.

test-case.name: K-NumericMultiply-19
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `(xs:integer(6) * xs:double(2)) instance of xs:double`.

test-case.name: K-NumericMultiply-20
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `(xs:double(6) * xs:double(2)) instance of xs:double`.

test-case.name: K-NumericMultiply-21
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string(xs:float("NaN") * 3) eq "NaN"`.

test-case.name: K-NumericMultiply-22
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string(xs:double("NaN") * 3) eq "NaN"`.

test-case.name: K-NumericMultiply-23
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string(3 * xs:float("NaN")) eq "NaN"`.

test-case.name: K-NumericMultiply-24
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string(3 * xs:double("NaN")) eq "NaN"`.

test-case.name: op-numeric-multiply-1
test-case.description: Check dynamic type of numeric multiply on arguments of union of numeric types and untypedAtomic.

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-multiply-001
test-case.description: test multiplication by xs:double NaN
test-case.test: declare function local:square($arg as xs:double) as xs:double { $arg * $arg }; xs:double('NaN') * local:square(7)

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-multiply-002
test-case.description: test multiplication by xs:double NaN
test-case.test: declare function local:square($arg as xs:double) as xs:double { $arg * $arg }; local:square(7) * xs:double('NaN')

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-multiply-003
test-case.description: test multiplication by xs:double 1
test-case.test: declare function local:square($arg as xs:double) as xs:double { $arg * $arg }; local:square(7) * 1e0

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-multiply-004
test-case.description: test multiplication by xs:double 1
test-case.test: declare function local:square($arg as xs:double) as xs:double { $arg * $arg }; 1e0 * local:square(7)

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-multiply-005
test-case.description: test multiplication by xs:double -1
test-case.test: declare function local:square($arg as xs:double) as xs:double { $arg * $arg }; local:square(7) * -1e0

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-multiply-006
test-case.description: test multiplication by xs:double -1
test-case.test: declare function local:square($arg as xs:double) as xs:double { $arg * $arg }; -1e0 * local:square(7)

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-multiply-007
test-case.description: test multiplication by xs:float NaN
test-case.test: declare function local:square($arg as xs:float) as xs:float { $arg * $arg }; xs:float('NaN') * local:square(7)

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-multiply-008
test-case.description: test multiplication by xs:float NaN
test-case.test: declare function local:square($arg as xs:float) as xs:float { $arg * $arg }; local:square(7) * xs:float('NaN')

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-multiply-009
test-case.description: test multiplication by xs:float 1
test-case.test: declare function local:square($arg as xs:float) as xs:float { $arg * $arg }; local:square(7) * xs:float(1)

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-multiply-010
test-case.description: test multiplication by xs:float 1
test-case.test: declare function local:square($arg as xs:float) as xs:float { $arg * $arg }; xs:float(1) * local:square(7)

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-multiply-011
test-case.description: test multiplication by xs:float -1
test-case.test: declare function local:square($arg as xs:float) as xs:float { $arg * $arg }; local:square(7) * xs:float(-1)

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-multiply-012
test-case.description: test multiplication by xs:float -1
test-case.test: declare function local:square($arg as xs:float) as xs:float { $arg * $arg }; xs:float(-1) * local:square(7)

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-multiply-013
test-case.description: test multiplication by xs:decimal 0
test-case.test: declare function local:square($arg as xs:decimal) as xs:decimal { $arg * $arg }; local:square(2.0) * 0.0

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-multiply-014
test-case.description: test multiplication by xs:decimal 0
test-case.test: declare function local:square($arg as xs:decimal) as xs:decimal { $arg * $arg }; 0.0 * local:square(7.0)

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-multiply-015
test-case.description: test multiplication by xs:decimal 1
test-case.test: declare function local:square($arg as xs:decimal) as xs:decimal { $arg * $arg }; local:square(7.0) * 1.0

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-multiply-016
test-case.description: test multiplication by xs:decimal 1
test-case.test: declare function local:square($arg as xs:decimal) as xs:decimal { $arg * $arg }; 1.0 * local:square(7.0)

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-multiply-017
test-case.description: test multiplication by xs:decimal -1
test-case.test: declare function local:square($arg as xs:decimal) as xs:decimal { $arg * $arg }; local:square(7.0) * -1.0

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-multiply-018
test-case.description: test multiplication by xs:decimal -1
test-case.test: declare function local:square($arg as xs:decimal) as xs:decimal { $arg * $arg }; -1.0 * local:square(7.0)

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-multiply-019
test-case.description: test multiplication by xs:integer 0
test-case.test: declare function local:square($arg as xs:integer) as xs:integer { $arg * $arg }; local:square(2) * 0

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-multiply-020
test-case.description: test multiplication by xs:integer 0
test-case.test: declare function local:square($arg as xs:integer) as xs:integer { $arg * $arg }; 0 * local:square(2)

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-multiply-021
test-case.description: test multiplication by xs:integer 1
test-case.test: declare function local:square($arg as xs:integer) as xs:integer { $arg * $arg }; local:square(7) * 1

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-multiply-022
test-case.description: test multiplication by xs:integer 1
test-case.test: declare function local:square($arg as xs:integer) as xs:integer { $arg * $arg }; 1 * local:square(7)

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-multiply-023
test-case.description: test multiplication by xs:integer -1
test-case.test: declare function local:square($arg as xs:integer) as xs:integer { $arg * $arg }; local:square(7) * -1

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-multiply-024
test-case.description: test multiplication by xs:integer -1
test-case.test: declare function local:square($arg as xs:integer) as xs:integer { $arg * $arg }; -1 * local:square(7)

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-multiply-025
test-case.description: test multiplication of large xs:decimal
test-case.test: declare function local:square($arg as xs:decimal) as xs:decimal { $arg * $arg }; local:square(9223372036854775808.1) gt 0

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-multiply-026
test-case.description: test multiplication of large xs:integer
test-case.test: declare function local:square($arg as xs:integer) as xs:integer { $arg * $arg }; local:square(9223372036854775808) gt 0

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-multiply-027
test-case.description: ensure that multiplying xs:integers returns an xs:integer
test-case.test: declare function local:integer($x as xs:decimal) { if ($x mod 1 eq 0) then xs:integer($x) else $x }; (local:integer(2) * local:integer(2)) instance of xs:integer
